panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter", mode!="idle"}[6h])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter"}[6h])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter", mode="system"}[24h])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter"}[24h])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter", mode="user"}[24h])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter"}[24h])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter", mode="nice"}[24h])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter"}[24h])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter", mode="iowait"}[24h])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="node-exporter"}[24h])))

panels.title: Memory Stack
